name: Ice Ice Baby (isurfraz)
description:
Ice Ice Baby is a survival game set during prehistoric times. You have awoken to find your tribe has moved on without you leaving you to fend for your baby on your own. Journey to the mountain avoiding the cold and wildlife as you try to keep your baby alive.

Controls:

Move - WASD

Evade - Left Control

Attack - Space

Interact - E (Hold)

Team:

Isaac Surfraz - Programming

Karolina Lewszyk - Art

Deividas Pucita - Programming

All assets and code were created from scratch except for the fire particle effect and sound effects.
